articles.description: A nasty encounter with Donald Trump and much more in this entertaining new series. Plus: The Handmaid’s Tale ends. Here’s what to watch this evening
articles.content:
When Ruby Wax Met
9pm, BBC Two
Trump scared the shit out of me, recalls Ruby Wax. And I think its my fault that he kept a career going. Its a striking opening gambit but the footage of their 1996 j… [+2901 chars]

articles.title: Amanda Seyfried shares a heartfelt tribute to her late Big Love costar Bill Paxton - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 35-year-old actress shared a throwback photo standing side-by-side the late actor as they worked together on the set of the hit HBO series Big Love.
articles.content:
Amanda Seyfried shared a tribute to her late castmate, Bill Paxton, on her Instagram account on Friday.

articles.title: Lorde: Solar Power review – she has earned her wistful, floaty record - The Guardian
articles.description: The New Zealand star embraces mellowness on a third album shaded by climate anxiety and a rejection of celebrity
articles.content: Sometimes, Solar Power Lordes long-awaited third album feels like the polar opposite of her second, 2017s Melodrama: it is filled with calm, sun-kissed serenity. Over 12 outdoorsy but often inward-lo… [+4751 chars]
